Minimal Web Designs of Pittsburgh was founded to give writers of all stripes a way to enhance their web presence with a clean, professional website. Minimal Web Designs of Pittsburgh is freelance web design company consisting of, founder and freelancer, Tiffany White. The goal is this: I build websites for writers of all stripes, new authors and pros. I know what writers need because I am one. I also have a keen eye for design and will build a clean, usable website, no fuss, and incorporate the details YOU want. I collaborate on projects with clients and offer my services during the summer as I am a student who will be specializing in UX design. I will work with you on pricing. Minimal Web Designs of Pittsburgh is a web design company for writers, by a writer.
